controller.factories
Class Text

java.lang.Object
  controller.factories.Text
Direct Known Subclasses:
TextAdvertisement, TextEMail, TextLetter
public abstract class Text
extends java.lang.Object

This is an abstract class for displayed forms of text. It provides methods for sub-classes which return Strings with text parts.

Author:
Antje Huber
